enum.name: MeasurementType
enum.description: Point of reference for time measurement

enumMember.name: since-creation
enumMember.description: Relative to the PDP context creation time

enumMember.name: since-update
enumMember.description: Relative to the last PDP context update time

enumMember.name: public
enumMember.description: User does not need to be subscribed for APN

enumMember.name: from-user
enumMember.description: Can choose which APN to connect

enumMember.name: from-network
enumMember.description: Can connect to default APN for the MME/SGW/SGSN

enumMember.name: restricted
enumMember.description: Admit only users subscribed for APN

enumMember.name: unblocked
enumMember.description: No restrictions on PDP context creation

enumMember.name: blocked
enumMember.description: New PDP context creation fully blocked

enumMember.name: 3gpp-rel6
enumMember.description: 3GPP-rel6 output format BCD

enum.name: AddressAllocation
enum.description: Method used to allocate IPv4 addresses to PDP contexts

enumMember.name: local-pool
enumMember.description: Address is assigned from local pool

enumMember.name: radius
enumMember.description: RADIUS authentication assigns addresses

enumMember.name: static
enumMember.description: Only static addresses accepted

enumMember.name: dhcp-client
enumMember.description: DHCP server assigns addresses

enumMember.name: radius-local-pool
enumMember.description: GGSN assigns addresses from radius local pool

enumMember.name: l2tp
enumMember.description: L2TP assigns addresses

enumMember.name: shared-ip-pool
enumMember.description: GGSN assigns addresses from shared ip pool

enumMember.name: radius-shared-ip-pool
enumMember.description: GGSN assigns addresses from either RADIUS or shared ip pool

enumMember.name: terminate
enumMember.description: Reject PDP context activate and update requests

enumMember.name: continue
enumMember.description: Retry once, and then continue context without credit control

enumMember.name: retry-and-terminate
enumMember.description: Retry once, and then terminate context

enum.name: DefaultTriggerFormat
enum.description: Trigger type format to include in Credit Control Requests

enumMember.name: trigger
enumMember.description: Use trigger AVP (group of 0 or more trigger-type AVPs) as trigger-format in CCR

enumMember.name: trigger-type
enumMember.description: Use Trigger-Type AVP as trigger-format in CCR

enumMember.name: msisdn
enumMember.description: Use MSISDN as subscription identifier

enumMember.name: nai
enumMember.description: Use NAI as subscription identifier

enumMember.name: imsi
enumMember.description: Use IMSI as subscription identifier

enum.name: PccRelease
enum.description: Configure the PCC release to use

enumMember.description: Gx PCC release 7
Gx PCC release 8
Gx PCC release 9

enumMember.name: geran
enumMember.description: GSM/EDGE radio access network

enumMember.name: wlan
enumMember.description: Wireless local area network

enumMember.name: utran
enumMember.description: WCDMA/UMTS terrestrial radio access network

enumMember.name: gan
enumMember.description: Generic access network

enumMember.name: hspa
enumMember.description: High speed packet access evolution network

enumMember.name: eutran
enumMember.description: LTE/Evolved UMTS terrestrial radio access network

enumMember.name: unknown
enumMember.description: Unknown or missing

enum.name: TerminationAction
enum.description: Termination action taken for the session

enumMember.name: terminate
enumMember.description: Unconditional termination of the credit control session and PDP context

enumMember.name: failure-action
enumMember.description: Action depends on failure action configuration

enum.name: Ipv6AddressAllocation
enum.description: Method used to allocate IPv6 addresses to PDP contexts

enumMember.name: radius
enumMember.description: RADIUS authentication assigns addresses

enumMember.name: shared-ip-pool
enumMember.description: GGSN assigns addresses from shared ip pool

enumMember.name: radius-shared-ip-pool
enumMember.description: GGSN assigns addresses from either RADIUS or local pool

enumMember.name: static
enumMember.description: HLR/HSS assigns addresses

enum.name: ControlContext
enum.description: Environment definition for service aware charging and control

enumMember.name: 3gpp
enumMember.description: Charging and control according to 3GPP standard (supports Ro and Gx interfaces)

enumMember.name: enable
enumMember.description: Enable online charging

enumMember.name: disable
enumMember.description: Disable online charging

enumMember.name: send
enumMember.description: Send a final report for the rating group

enumMember.name: not-send
enumMember.description: Don't send a final report for the rating group

enumMember.name: af11
enumMember.description: Assured forwarding class 1, low drop precedence

enumMember.name: af12
enumMember.description: Assured forwarding class 1, medium drop precedence

enumMember.name: af32
enumMember.description: Assured forwarding class 3, medium drop precedence

enumMember.name: af33
enumMember.description: Assured forwarding class 3, high drop precedence

enumMember.name: af41
enumMember.description: Assured forwarding class 4, low drop precedence

enumMember.name: af42
enumMember.description: Assured forwarding class 4, medium drop precedence

enumMember.name: af43
enumMember.description: Assured forwarding class 4, high drop precedence

enumMember.name: ef
enumMember.description: Expedited forwarding

enumMember.name: be
enumMember.description: Best effort forwarding

enumMember.name: af31
enumMember.description: Assured forwarding class 3, low drop precedence

enumMember.name: af13
enumMember.description: Assured forwarding class 1, high drop precedence

enumMember.name: af21
enumMember.description: Assured forwarding class 2, low drop precedence

enumMember.name: af22
enumMember.description: Assured forwarding class 2, medium drop precedence

enumMember.name: af23
enumMember.description: Assured forwarding class 2, high drop precedence

enumMember.name: ipv4
enumMember.description: The session with IPv4 address on Ppb is the aggregated session

enumMember.name: ipv6
enumMember.description: The session with IPv6 address on Ppb is the aggregated session

enumMember.name: reject-request
enumMember.description: Reject PDP context activate and update requests

enumMember.name: use-local
enumMember.description: Use the local policy configuration for the IP session until it terminates

enumMember.name: use-local-reestablish
enumMember.description: Use the local policy configuration and try to reestablish connection periodically
Size of slice on Ppb is 2
Size of slice on Ppb is 1024
Size of slice on Ppb is 512
Size of slice on Ppb is 256
Size of slice on Ppb is 128
Size of slice on Ppb is 64
Size of slice on Ppb is 32
Size of slice on Ppb is 16
Size of slice on Ppb is 8
Size of slice on Ppb is 4
Size of slice on Ppb is 1
Size of slice on Ppb is 2048

enumMember.name: terminate-contexts
enumMember.description: Terminate contexts if end-user-service-denied is received from PRS

enumMember.name: failure-action-no-recovery
enumMember.description: Action without recovery if end-user-service-denied is received from PRS

enumMember.name: ipv4
enumMember.description: IPv4 address is assigned when fallback case happens for dual stack

enumMember.name: ipv6
enumMember.description: IPv6 address is assigned when fallback case happens for dual stack

enumMember.name: ipv4
enumMember.description: IPv4 PDP context type

enumMember.name: ipv6
enumMember.description: IPv6 PDP context type

enumMember.name: ipv4-ipv6
enumMember.description: IPv4 and IPv6 PDP contexts

enumMember.name: ipv4v6
enumMember.description: IPv4v6 PDP contexts

derivedDataType.name: PlmnName
derivedDataType.description: PLMN name consists of up to 20 letters, numbers, periods and dashes

derivedDataType.name: UplinkLimitation
derivedDataType.description: Uplink throughput limitation per context and access control rule

derivedDataType.name: UserCategory
derivedDataType.description: Name of user category, default or 0-63

derivedDataType.name: ErrorResultCodes
derivedDataType.description: Must be a result code or a range of result codes.

derivedDataType.name: PoolName
derivedDataType.description: Must be a string of 121 or fewer characters and may contain letters, numbers, decimals and dashes.

derivedDataType.name: SingletonNodeName
derivedDataType.description: Type of single node name, has to be equal to 1

derivedDataType.name: Name
derivedDataType.description: Must be a string of 100 or fewer characters and may contain letters, numbers, decimals and dashes.

derivedDataType.name: EcimEmpty
derivedDataType.description: The empty built-in type represents a leaf that does not have any value, it conveys information by its presence or absence.

derivedDataType.name: RangedString20
derivedDataType.description: Must contain only letters, numbers, underscores or dashes

derivedDataType.name: PdpSignalingRate
derivedDataType.description: PDP-Context signaling options for this APN

derivedDataType.name: RoamingClass
derivedDataType.description: List of roaming classes assigned to this charging characteristic (1 .. 24)

derivedDataType.name: RangedString64
derivedDataType.description: Must contain only letters, numbers, underscores or dashes

derivedDataType.name: RuleSpaceName
derivedDataType.description: Must be a string beginning with a number or letter and consisting of letters, numbers, dashes and underscores.

derivedDataType.name: AlarmLimit
derivedDataType.description: APN utilization limit at which to raise alarm

derivedDataType.name: DownlinkLimitation
derivedDataType.description: Downlink throughput limitation per context and access control rule

derivedDataType.name: GnCauseCode
derivedDataType.description: Cause code sent on the Gn interface

class.name: Apn
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @disableUplinkDscpRemapping satisfies (not(exists(./BandwidthConstraint) or exists(./UplinkDscpRemapping)))'><name path='.'/>,disableUplinkDscpRemapping: Incompatible with bandwidth-constraint or uplink-dscp-remapping settings of this APN</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $ruleSpace in @allowRuleSpace satisfies ($ruleSpace = /ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/RuleSpace/@ruleSpaceId)'><name path='.'/>,allowRuleSpace: Rule space must be configured under [managed-element epg pgw]</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $context in @routingInstance satisfies ($context = /ManagedElement/Context/@contextNameId)'><name path='.'/>,routingInstance: Routing instance must be configured under 'managed-element context'</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: apnId
attribute.description: Access point name

attribute.name: routingInstance
attribute.description: Routing instance for in-APN traffic

attribute.name: giAddressRange
attribute.description: IPv4 address range to use in APN routing instance

attribute.name: pgwEnabled
attribute.description: Enable PGW on this APN

attribute.name: disableUplinkDscpRemapping
attribute.description: Do not change DSCP in uplink packets

attribute.name: allowRuleSpace
attribute.description: Rule space authorized for the APN

attribute.name: msToMsUnblocked
attribute.description: Disables MS2MS filtering

attribute.name: accessRestrictionsID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: selectionMode
attribute.description: User access to the APN

class.name: Address
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @static satisfies (not(exists(@radius)))'><name path='.'/>,static: Cannot configure a subnet as static and radius at the same time</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @static satisfies (not(exists(../@addressAllocation)) or (not(../@addressAllocation eq 5)))'><name path='.'/>,static: Static address range is not allowed with radius-local-pool address allocation method</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @radius satisfies (not(exists(@static)))'><name path='.'/>,radius: Cannot configure a subnet as static and radius at the same time</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @radius satisfies (exists(../@addressAllocation) and ((../@addressAllocation eq 2) or (../@addressAllocation eq 5)))'><name path='.'/>,radius: IP address allocation method must be set to radius-local-pool or radius</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @radius satisfies (not(exists(@subnetName)))'><name path='.'/>,radius: Cannot configure a radius subnet with subnet-name</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @subnetName satisfies (not(exists(@radius)))'><name path='.'/>,subnetName: Subnet name cannot be configured for radius subnet</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @subnetName satisfies (not(exists(../@addressAllocation)) or (not(../@addressAllocation eq 5)))'><name path='.'/>,subnetName: Subnet name is not allowed with radius-local-pool address allocation method</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: addressId
attribute.description: Address range for APN network

attribute.name: static
attribute.description: Range is only for static contexts

attribute.name: radius
attribute.description: Specified address range is used for allocation through RADIUS

attribute.name: subnetName
attribute.description: Name of the subnet

class.name: PdpContext
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @enableDedicatedBearer satisfies (exists(/ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/License/@policyChargingControl))'><name path='.'/>,enableDedicatedBearer: Policy and Charging Control must be licensed</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @sharedIpPool satisfies ($attr = /ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/SharedIpPool/@sharedIpPoolId)'><name path='.'/>,sharedIpPool: Shared IP pool name must be configured under [managed-element epg pgw shared-ip-pool]</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @sharedIpPool satisfies ((exists(@addressAllocation) and (@addressAllocation eq 7 or @addressAllocation eq 8)) or (exists(@ipv6AddressAllocation) and (@ipv6AddressAllocation eq 7 or @ipv6AddressAllocation eq 8)))'><name path='.'/>,sharedIpPool: shared-ip-pool range is not allowed with other address allocation method except sharedip-pool and radius-shared-ip-pool</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @allowFramedIpNetmask satisfies (not(exists(@addressAllocation)) or (not(@addressAllocation eq 5)))'><name path='.'/>,allowFramedIpNetmask: Framed IP Netmask is not allowed when APN is configured for radius-local-pool address allocation method</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @allowFramedIpNetmask satisfies (not(exists(@addressAllocation)) or (not(@addressAllocation eq 8)))'><name path='.'/>,allowFramedIpNetmask: Framed IP Netmask is not allowed when APN is configured for radius-shared-ip-pool address allocation method</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @useFramedRoute satisfies (not(exists(@addressAllocation)) or (not(@addressAllocation eq 5)))'><name path='.'/>,useFramedRoute: Framed IP Netmask is not allowed when APN is configured for radius-local-pool address allocation method</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @primaryIpVersion satisfies (exists(@pdpType) and (@pdpType eq 3))'><name path='.'/>,primaryIpVersion: primaryIpVersion is configurable only when pdp-type is ipv4v6</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @prioritizedIpVersion satisfies (exists(@pdpType) and ((@pdpType eq 3) or (@pdpType eq 4)))'><name path='.'/>,prioritizedIpVersion: prioritizedIpVersion is configurable only when pdp-type is ipv4v6 or ipv4-ipv6</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

action.name: terminateUserCategory
action.description: Terminate all PDP contexts in access point name matching user-category

action.name: terminate
action.description: Terminate all PDP contexts in access point name

attribute.name: pdpContextID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: creation
attribute.description: PDP context creation state

attribute.name: pdpType
attribute.description: PDP context type

attribute.name: limit
attribute.description: Maximum active PDP contexts

attribute.name: addressAllocation
attribute.description: Method used to allocate IPv4 addresses to PDP contexts

attribute.name: alarmLimit
attribute.description: APN utilization limit at which to raise alarm

attribute.name: allowFramedIpNetmask
attribute.description: Allow framed-ip-netmask attribute from RADIUS

attribute.name: useFramedRoute
attribute.description: Use framed route received from RADIUS

attribute.name: enableDedicatedBearer
attribute.description: Enable dedicated bearer

attribute.name: sharedIpPool
attribute.description: Shared IP pool name

attribute.name: primaryIpVersion
attribute.description: Primary IP version for Dual Stack

attribute.name: prioritizedIpVersion
attribute.description: Prioritized IP version for Dual Stack

attribute.name: ipv6AddressAllocation
attribute.description: Method used to allocate IPv6 addresses to PDP contexts

attribute.name: rejectRequestWithoutPco
attribute.description: Reject create pdp context requests if the pco field is missing or empty

attribute.name: policingID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: maximumBandwidthUplink
attribute.description: Maximum bandwidth uplink

attribute.name: maximumBandwidthDownlink
attribute.description: Maximum bandwidth

attribute.name: noPolicing
attribute.description: Turn policing off

attribute.name: burstTime
attribute.description: Burst time window

attribute.name: minimumBurstValue
attribute.description: Minimum burst value

attribute.name: maximumBurstValue
attribute.description: Maximum burst value

attribute.name: sessionControlID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: excludeDedicatedSignaling
attribute.description: Exclude dedicated signaling from session management handling

attribute.name: idleTimeoutID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: noSupervision
attribute.description: Don't allow idle supervision

class.name: PlmnId
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='some $plmnId in ../@plmnId satisfies (@plmnIdId = /ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/Plmn[@plmnId eq $plmnId]/PlmnId/@plmnIdId)'><name path='.'/>: plmn-id must be configured under [managed-element epg pgw plmn]</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: plmnIdId
attribute.description: SGSN public land mobile network identifier

attribute.name: timeout
attribute.description: Maximum duration for a context

attribute.name: measurementType
attribute.description: Point of reference for time measurement

class.name: Plmn
class.description: Timeout settings based on SGSN PLMN
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='@plmnId = /ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/Plmn/@plmnId'><name path='.'/>: plmn must be configured under [managed-element epg pgw]</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: plmnId
attribute.description: Public land mobile network name

class.name: SgsnPlmnId
class.description: Timeout settings based on SGSN PLMN IDs

attribute.name: sgsnPlmnIdID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: noSupervision
attribute.description: Do not allow session supervision based on SGSN PLMN ID

attribute.name: sessionTimeoutID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: noSupervision
attribute.description: Don't allow session supervision

class.name: Signaling
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @ggsnDeletesPerSecond satisfies (not(exists(@ggsnDeletesNoLimit)))'><name path='.'/>,ggsnDeletesPerSecond: The following attributes can not be combined: ggsn-deletes-per-second, ggsn-deletes-no-limit</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @ggsnDeletesNoLimit satisfies (not(exists(@ggsnDeletesPerSecond)))'><name path='.'/>,ggsnDeletesNoLimit: The following attributes can not be combined: ggsn-deletes-per-second, ggsn-deletes-no-limit</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: signalingID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: ggsnDeletesPerSecond
attribute.description: GGSN-initiated deletions per second per session controller

attribute.name: sgsnCreatesPerSecond
attribute.description: Maximum SGSN creates per second per session controller

attribute.name: sgwCreatesPerSecond
attribute.description: Maximum SGW creates per second per session controller

attribute.name: sgsnCreatesPerSecondThreshold
attribute.description: NC throttling threshold, NC throttles when value > sgsnCreatesPerSecond

attribute.name: ggsnDeletesNoLimit
attribute.description: No limit for GGSN-initiated deletions

attribute.name: gtpID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: noPayloadCompression
attribute.description: Prohibit SGSN payload compression

attribute.name: wlan
attribute.description: WLAN allowed for APN

attribute.name: bandwidthConstraintId
attribute.description: Type of traffic to limit, values: ef|af1|af2|af3|af4

attribute.name: limit
attribute.description: Limit for traffic

class.name: Conversational-1
class.description: DSCP name for conversational class 1 traffic

attribute.name: conversational-1ID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: mediumDropPrecedence
attribute.description: SDU error ratio = (7*10^-3 | 10^-3)

attribute.name: highDropPrecedence
attribute.description: SDU error ratio = (10^-1 | 10^-2)

class.name: Conversational-2
class.description: DSCP name for conversational class 2 traffic

attribute.name: conversational-2ID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: mediumDropPrecedence
attribute.description: SDU error ratio = (7*10^-3 | 10^-3)

attribute.name: highDropPrecedence
attribute.description: SDU error ratio = (10^-1 | 10^-2)

class.name: Streaming-1
class.description: DSCP name for streaming class 1 traffic

attribute.name: streaming-1ID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: mediumDropPrecedence
attribute.description: SDU error ratio = (7*10^-3 | 10^-3)

attribute.name: highDropPrecedence
attribute.description: SDU error ratio = (10^-1 | 10^-2)

class.name: Streaming-2
class.description: DSCP name for streaming class 2 traffic

attribute.name: streaming-2ID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: mediumDropPrecedence
attribute.description: SDU error ratio = (7*10^-3 | 10^-3)

attribute.name: highDropPrecedence
attribute.description: SDU error ratio = (10^-1 | 10^-2)

class.name: Interactive-1
class.description: DSCP name for interactive class 1 traffic

attribute.name: interactive-1ID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: mediumDropPrecedence
attribute.description: SDU error ratio = (7*10^-3 | 10^-3)

attribute.name: highDropPrecedence
attribute.description: SDU error ratio = (10^-1 | 10^-2)

class.name: Interactive-2
class.description: DSCP name for interactive class 2 traffic

attribute.name: interactive-2ID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: mediumDropPrecedence
attribute.description: SDU error ratio = (7*10^-3 | 10^-3)

attribute.name: highDropPrecedence
attribute.description: SDU error ratio = (10^-1 | 10^-2)

class.name: Interactive-3
class.description: DSCP name for interactive class 3 traffic

attribute.name: interactive-3ID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: mediumDropPrecedence
attribute.description: SDU error ratio = (7*10^-3 | 10^-3)

attribute.name: highDropPrecedence
attribute.description: SDU error ratio = (10^-1 | 10^-2)

attribute.name: backgroundID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: mediumDropPrecedence
attribute.description: SDU error ratio = (7*10^-3 | 10^-3)

attribute.name: highDropPrecedence
attribute.description: SDU error ratio = (10^-1 | 10^-2)

attribute.name: uplinkDscpRemappingID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: nameServerId
attribute.description: IPv4 DNS name server address

attribute.name: serviceBasedChargingID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: controlContext
attribute.description: Environment definition for service aware charging and control

attribute.name: radiusAccessControl
attribute.description: Enable Access Control over RADIUS

class.name: BandwidthControl
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='exists(/ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/License/@serviceAwareBandwidthMgmt)'><name path='.'/>: Service-aware bandwidth management must be licensed</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: bandwidthControlID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

class.name: ThroughputLimitation
class.description: Throughput limitation per context and access control rule

attribute.name: throughputLimitationId
attribute.description: Identifier of the throughput-limitation profile

attribute.name: uplinkLimitation
attribute.description: Uplink throughput limitation per context and access control rule

attribute.name: downlinkLimitation
attribute.description: Downlink throughput limitation per context and access control rule

attribute.name: accessControlRule
attribute.description: Access control rule for which to apply the throughput limitation

attribute.name: policyControlID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: dynamicID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: endUserFailureHandlingID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: serviceDenied
attribute.description: Action if end-user-service-denied is received from PRS

attribute.name: notFound
attribute.description: Action if end-user-not-found is received from PRS

class.name: GxProfile
class.description: Settings for standard and enhanced Gx
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='every $das in @diameterApplicationSystem satisfies ($das = /ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/Diameter/DiameterApplicationSystem/@diameterApplicationSystemId)'><name path='.'/>,diameterApplicationSystem: Diameter application system must be configured under [managed-element epg pgw diameter diameter-application-system]</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @disableGxExtensions satisfies (not(exists(@usageReporting)))'><name path='.'/>,disableGxExtensions: Incompatible with usage-reporting</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @disableGxExtensions satisfies (not(exists(@extendedUsageReporting)))'><name path='.'/>,disableGxExtensions: Incompatible with extended-usage-reporting</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @qosControl satisfies (exists(/ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/License/@operatorQosControl))'><name path='.'/>,qosControl: Operator QoS control must be licensed</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @optimizedPushUpdate satisfies (exists(../../../@controlContext) and (../../../@controlContext eq 1))'><name path='.'/>,optimizedPushUpdate: Requires control-context 3gpp</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @optimizedPushUpdate satisfies (not(exists(@disableGxExtensions)))'><name path='.'/>,optimizedPushUpdate: Incompatible with disable-gx-extensions</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @qosPushUpdate satisfies (exists(/ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/License/@gxInitiatedQosModification))'><name path='.'/>,qosPushUpdate: Gx initiated QoS modification (qos-push-update) must be licensed</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @usageReporting satisfies (exists(../../../@controlContext) and (../../../@controlContext eq 1))'><name path='.'/>,usageReporting: Requires control-context 3gpp</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @usageReporting satisfies (not(exists(@disableGxExtensions)))'><name path='.'/>,usageReporting: Incompatible with disable-gx-extensions</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @usageReporting satisfies (not(exists(@extendedUsageReporting)))'><name path='.'/>,usageReporting: Can not configure both usage-reporting and extended-usage-reporting at the same time</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @usageReporting satisfies (not(exists(@extendedUsageMonitoring)))'><name path='.'/>,usageReporting: Can not configure both usage-reporting and extended-usage-monitoring at the same time</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @extendedUsageReporting satisfies (exists(../../../@controlContext) and (../../../@controlContext eq 1))'><name path='.'/>,extendedUsageReporting: Requires control-context 3gpp</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @extendedUsageReporting satisfies (not(exists(@disableGxExtensions)))'><name path='.'/>,extendedUsageReporting: Incompatible with disable-gx-extensions</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @extendedUsageReporting satisfies (not(exists(@usageReporting)))'><name path='.'/>,extendedUsageReporting: Can not configure both usage-reporting and extended-usage-reporting at the same time</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @extendedUsageReporting satisfies (not(exists(@extendedUsageMonitoring)))'><name path='.'/>,extendedUsageReporting: Can not configure both extended-usage-monitoring and extended-usage-reporting at the same time</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @extendedUsageMonitoring satisfies (exists(../../../@controlContext) and (../../../@controlContext eq 1))'><name path='.'/>,extendedUsageMonitoring: Requires control-context 3gpp</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @extendedUsageMonitoring satisfies (not(exists(@pccRelease) and (@pccRelease eq 7)))'><name path='.'/>,extendedUsageMonitoring: Can not configure both extended-usage-monitoring and pcc-release 7 at the same time</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @extendedUsageMonitoring satisfies (not(exists(@usageReporting)))'><name path='.'/>,extendedUsageMonitoring: Can not configure both extended-usage-monitoring and usage-reporting at the same time</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @extendedUsageMonitoring satisfies (not(exists(@extendedUsageReporting)))'><name path='.'/>,extendedUsageMonitoring: Can not configure both extended-usage-monitoring and extended-usage-reporting at the same time</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @pccRelease satisfies (not($attr eq 7) or (not(exists(@extendedUsageMonitoring))))'><name path='.'/>,pccRelease: Gx PCC Release 7 is not compatible with extended-usage-monitoring</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: gxProfileId
attribute.description: Profile identifier

attribute.name: diameterApplicationSystem
attribute.description: Diameter application system

attribute.name: failureAction
attribute.description: Failure settings

attribute.name: disableGxExtensions
attribute.description: Do not allow use of Gx+ extensions

attribute.name: qosControl
attribute.description: Enable support of QoS control over Gx release 6

attribute.name: denyEmptyContext
attribute.description: Deny PDP context activation without authorized services

attribute.name: ruleSpaceNegotiation
attribute.description: Enable rule-space-negotiation over Gx

attribute.name: immediateCreditControl
attribute.description: Immediate credit control for dynamic charging rules

attribute.name: disconnectIpSessions
attribute.description: Delete all active IP sessions using a CRF if contact is lost or server has restarted

attribute.name: optimizedPushUpdate
attribute.description: Enable push update optimization of charging rules from PCRF over Gx release 6

attribute.name: qosPushUpdate
attribute.description: Enable support for PCRF unsolicited triggered QoS change over Gx release 6

attribute.name: usageReporting
attribute.description: Enable usage reporting

attribute.name: extendedUsageReporting
attribute.description: Enable usage reporting at interim update

attribute.name: subscriptionId
attribute.description: Subscription identifier

attribute.name: pccImeiEncoding
attribute.description: Pcc-IMEI-encoding

attribute.name: extendedUsageMonitoring
attribute.description: Enable usage monitoring at interim update

attribute.name: pccRelease
attribute.description: Configure the PCC release to use

attribute.name: noOverrideAuthorizedQos
attribute.description: Disable the overriding of PCRF QoS setting

attribute.name: alwaysIncludeSubscriptionId
attribute.description: Allow include subscription-id in CCR-U and CCR-T

attribute.name: chargingControlID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: online
attribute.description: Enable/Disable online charging

class.name: CreditControl
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='exists(/ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/Diameter)'><name path='.'/>: Require node level diameter configuration</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: creditControlID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

class.name: RoProfile
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='every $das in @diameterApplicationSystem satisfies ($das = /ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/Diameter/DiameterApplicationSystem/@diameterApplicationSystemId)'><name path='.'/>,diameterApplicationSystem: Diameter application system must be configured under [managed-element epg pgw diameter diameter-application-system]</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $das in @additionalAllowedDas satisfies ($das = /ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/Diameter/DiameterApplicationSystem/@diameterApplicationSystemId)'><name path='.'/>,additionalAllowedDas: Diameter application system must be configured under [managed-element epg pgw diameter diameter-application-system]</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @serviceContextId satisfies (not($attr eq "6.32251@3gpp.org") or (not(exists(/ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/@pgwEnabled) or exists(../../../@pgwEnabled))))'><name path='.'/>,serviceContextId: PGW does not support service-context-id 6.32251@3GPP.org</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @serviceContextId satisfies (not($attr eq "v1.gy.ggsn@ericsson.com") or (not(exists(/ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/@pgwEnabled) or exists(../../../@pgwEnabled))))'><name path='.'/>,serviceContextId: PGW does not support service-context-id v1.gy.ggsn@ericsson.com</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: roProfileId
attribute.description: Profile identifier

attribute.name: diameterApplicationSystem
attribute.description: Diameter application system

attribute.name: ccrContextId
attribute.description: Free-form service-context-ID used in credit control requests

attribute.name: noPreemptiveReservation
attribute.description: Do not allow OCS to reserve quota preemptively

attribute.name: noInitiateSessionOnActivation
attribute.description: Don't initiate a credit session on context activation

attribute.name: serviceContextId
attribute.description:
Credit-control service-context supported:
<id> Service context identifier 6.32251@3gpp.org Service context ID for 6.32251@3GPP.org 8.32251@3gpp.org Service context ID for 8.32251@3GPP.org v1.gy.ggsn@ericsson.com Service context ID for v1.gy.ggsn@ericsson.com v2.gy.ggsn@ericsson.com Service context ID for v2.gy.ggsn@ericsson.com

attribute.name: additionalAllowedDas
attribute.description: Additional diameter application system allowed for the profile

attribute.name: noZeroQuotaTermination
attribute.description: Do not send final report when credit instance is blocked

attribute.name: fuiRedirectOnFailureCode
attribute.description: Enable FUI redirection in case of failure result code received at MSCC-level

attribute.name: queryOcsID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

class.name: CreditControlUser
class.description: Settings to use if OCS enables credit control for the user

attribute.name: creditControlUserID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: cc
attribute.description: Charging characteristics

class.name: NoCreditControlUser
class.description: Settings to use if OCS disables credit control for the user

attribute.name: noCreditControlUserID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: cc
attribute.description: Charging characteristics

class.name: NoValidAnswer
class.description: Settings to use if OCS enables credit control for the user

attribute.name: noValidAnswerID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: cc
attribute.description: Charging characteristics

class.name: CcrAvp
class.description: Inclusion of optional attributes in credit control requests

attribute.name: ccrAvpID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: noUserPlmnId
noGgsnPlmnId
attribute.description: Do not include ggsn-plmn-id AVP in credit control requests

attribute.name: singleMscc
attribute.description: Setting to restrict the number of MSCCs per credit control requests to 1

attribute.name: noPdpContextType
attribute.description: Do not include PDP-Context-Type AVP, within PS-Information AVP, in credit control requests

attribute.name: creditInstanceId
attribute.description: Include credit instance ID in credit control requests

attribute.name: cumulativeUsedServiceUnit
attribute.description: Include cumulative used service unit in credit control requests

attribute.name: grantedServiceUnit
attribute.description: Include granted service unit in credit control requests

attribute.name: psPreviousInformation
attribute.description: Include PS-previous-Information AVP in credit control requests

attribute.name: serviceStartTimestamp
attribute.description: Include service start timestamp in credit control requests

attribute.name: defaultTriggerFormat
attribute.description: Trigger type format to include in credit control requests

attribute.name: noThreegpp2Bsid
attribute.description: Do not inclued 3gpp2-bsid avp in credit control requests.

attribute.name: selectRequestedApn
attribute.description: Include requested APN in CCR

attribute.name: redirectID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: appendUri
attribute.description: Append the request URL to the redirect URL

attribute.name: noUriFormatting
attribute.description: Do not format URL according to included formatting codes

attribute.name: failureID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: failureAction
attribute.description: Failure action settings

class.name: SessionTermination

attribute.name: gnCauseCode

attribute.name: errorResultCodes

attribute.name: terminationAction
attribute.description: Termination action taken for the session

attribute.name: chargingID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: selectRequestedApn

attribute.name: allowCcFromRadius

attribute.description: Service-identifier value

class.name: RadiusAssistedApnSelection
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='exists(/ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/License/@radiusAssistedApnSelection)'><name path='.'/>: RADIUS assisted APN selection must be licensed</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @default satisfies ($attr = /ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/Apn/@apnId)'><name path='.'/>: Referenced APN must be defined</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: radiusAssistedApnSelectionID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: default
attribute.description: Default APN name for radius assisted APN selection

attribute.name: useTimeout
attribute.description: Use idle timeout received from RADIUS

attribute.name: noSupervision
attribute.description: Do not allow RADIUS-based idle supervision

attribute.name: measurementType
attribute.description: Point of reference for time measurement

attribute.name: radiusID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

class.name: AwarePolicyBasedRouting
class.description: Enable APN as a service APN
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='exists(/ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/License/@awarePolicyBasedRouting)'><name path='.'/>: License for aware policy based routing must be enabled when setting aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../AccessRestrictions))'><name path='.'/>: access-restrictions are incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../@pgwEnabled))'><name path='.'/>: pgw-enabled is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../Gtp))'><name path='.'/>: gtp is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../Dhcp))'><name path='.'/>: dhcp is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../BandwidthConstraint))'><name path='.'/>: bandwidth-constraint is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../UplinkDscpRemapping))'><name path='.'/>: uplink-dscp-remapping is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../@disableUplinkDscpRemapping))'><name path='.'/>: disable-uplink-dscp-remapping is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../NameServer))'><name path='.'/>: name-server is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../ServiceBasedCharging))'><name path='.'/>: service-based-charging is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../@allowRuleSpace))'><name path='.'/>: allow-rule-space is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../Charging))'><name path='.'/>: charging is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../Roaming))'><name path='.'/>: roaming is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../Sgsn))'><name path='.'/>: sgsn is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../UserCategory))'><name path='.'/>: user-category is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../QosControl))'><name path='.'/>: qos-control is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../PCscf))'><name path='.'/>: p-cscf is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../PdpContext/@creation))'><name path='.'/>: PDP context creation state is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../PdpContext/@pdpType))'><name path='.'/>: PDP context type is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../PdpContext/@limit))'><name path='.'/>: PDP context limit is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../PdpContext/@enableDedicatedBearer))'><name path='.'/>: PDP context enable-dedicated-bearer is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../PdpContext/Policing))'><name path='.'/>: PDP context policing is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../PdpContext/SessionControl))'><name path='.'/>: PDP context session-control is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../PdpContext/@alarmLimit))'><name path='.'/>: PDP context alarm-limit is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../PdpContext/Signaling))'><name path='.'/>: PDP context signaling is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../PdpContext/@allowFramedIpNetmask))'><name path='.'/>: PDP context allow-framed-ip-netmask is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../PdpContext/@useFramedRoute))'><name path='.'/>: PDP context use-framed-route is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../PdpContext/@addressAllocation)) or (not(../PdpContext/@addressAllocation eq 1))'><name path='.'/>: PDP context address-allocation static is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../PdpContext/@addressAllocation)) or (not(../PdpContext/@addressAllocation eq 3))'><name path='.'/>: PDP context address-allocation dhcp-client is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../PdpContext/@addressAllocation)) or (not(../PdpContext/@addressAllocation eq 4))'><name path='.'/>: PDP context address-allocation local-pool is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='not(exists(../PdpContext/@addressAllocation)) or (not(../PdpContext/@addressAllocation eq 5))'><name path='.'/>: PDP context address-allocation radius-local-pool is incompatible with aware-policy-based-routing</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @radiusAccounting satisfies (exists(../Radius))'>A RADIUS server must be configured for this service APN before RADIUS accounting can be enabled</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @radiusAuthentication satisfies (exists(../Radius))'>A RADIUS server must be configured for this service APN before RADIUS authentication can be enabled</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: awarePolicyBasedRoutingID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: radiusAccounting
attribute.description: Enable RADIUS accounting for the service APN

attribute.name: radiusAuthentication
attribute.description: Enable RADIUS authentication for the service APN

attribute.name: creation
attribute.description: PDP context creation state

attribute.name: destinationRedirectID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: redirectSetId
attribute.description: Original destination address

attribute.name: destinationAddress
attribute.description: Redirection destination address

attribute.name: characteristicsID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: apnDefault
attribute.description: Valid charging characteristics value is 0 to 65535

action.name: statistics
action.description: Show Scalable Gi Routing Redundancy statistics per RI

attribute.name: routingRedundancyID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

class.name: RoutingInstance
class.description: Name of the routing instances used for redundancy
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='every $context in @outbound satisfies ($context = /ManagedElement/Context/@contextNameId)'><name path='.'/>,outbound: Routing instance must be configured under 'managed-element context'</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $context in @inbound satisfies ($context = /ManagedElement/Context/@contextNameId)'><name path='.'/>,inbound: Routing instance must be configured under 'managed-element context'</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: routingInstanceID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: inbound
attribute.description: Routing instance handling inbound packets from the peer

attribute.name: outbound
attribute.description: Routing instance handling outbound packets from the peer

attribute.name: loadDistributionID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: granularity
attribute.description: Granularity to use for PPB load distribution

class.name: ImsiBased
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @disable satisfies (not(exists(@override)))'><name path='.'/>,disable: The following attributes can not be combined: disable, override</assert> <assert id='set' test='every $attr in @override satisfies (not(exists(@disable)))'><name path='.'/>,override: The following attributes can not be combined: disable, override</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: imsiBasedID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: disable
attribute.description: Disable IMSI-based selection of charging characteristics

attribute.name: override
attribute.description: Force IMSI-based selection of charging characteristics

attribute.name: defaultID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: measurementType
attribute.description: Point of reference for time measurement

attribute.name: noSupervision
attribute.description: Don't allow default idle supervision

attribute.name: timeout
attribute.description: Maximum continuous idle time for a context

attribute.name: roamingID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: measurementType
attribute.description: Point of reference for time measurement

attribute.name: noSupervision
attribute.description: Don't allow roaming-based idle supervision

attribute.name: timeout
attribute.description: Maximum duration for a context

attribute.name: mmtelID
attribute.description: Id for mmtel

class.name: Emergency
class.description: Enable APN as an emergency APN

attribute.name: emergencyID
attribute.description: Id for Emergency

attribute.name: inactivityTimeout
attribute.description: Timeout for an inactive emergency session

attribute.name: ipv6AddressId
attribute.description: Address range for APN network

attribute.name: static
attribute.description: Range is only for static contexts

attribute.name: subnetName
attribute.description: Name of the subnet

attribute.name: ipv6NameServerId
attribute.description: IPv6 DNS name server address
